rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice Horrific Success and another creature: Search your library for a Rat card with mana value 8 or less and cast it without paying its mana cost. Shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
notes:
Rat cycle

3.20.23 Added Activate only as a sorcery.
4.6.23 Sac CARDNAME and a rat —> Sac CARDNAME and another creature
